name: Switch Them Up !
description:
SWITCH THEM UP This game is actually more a proof of concept than a complete experience. We used this jam to go out of our respective comfort zones and challenge ourselves. It shows the main mechanics, the IA functionnality and how it could be used for a full game.            

    The story in short

In a really distant future, the space forces of humanity are really weakened after sending too much efforts into an inside war, fighting about the uses of a new crystal : the NAUJ (found on the MASSIW planet).
On your spaceship equipped with a unique time-travel device, you travel back to the epitome of this war and have one objective : siding with the winner, no matter of which nation it is. You have to disturb the events to prevent humanity to fall into her doom... No matter what.

Controls

ZQSD or ARROWS = MOVING

SPACE or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON = SHOOT

F = SWITCH TEAM

Warning : the number of switches you can do in a level also represent your lives !
